settings.subheading: The yeedi vac 2 pro. Now, all clear!

settings.title: One-Click Emptying in 30 Days
settings.text: yeedi's 2.5L dust bag seals up to 30 days worth of dust in place so you can forget about vacuuming for a whole month.

settings.title: Customizable Settings
settings.text: Set the self-emptying frequency between Standard, High Frequency, and Do Not Disturb modes as per your needs.

settings.title: Self-Empties the Dustbin
settings.text: No more frequent dustbin emptying. yeedi self-empty station automatically cleans the dustbin for a truly hands-free cleaning experience.

settings.title: Which yeedi Is Right for You

settings.text: Our vacuum mop combos offer a great solution for those in need of a hard floor cleaner, but without the stress of doing much yourself. Why? We make robot vacuum cleaners for your smart home lifestyle. Buy from our award-winning range of vacuum mops below.

settings.title: What is a vacuum mop?
settings.text:
Vacuum mops combine the tasks of vacuuming and mopping, saving users hours of cleaning every week. The best vacuum and mops are great for people who like to spend less time cleaning.

Using any of these vacuum and mop combos will make your cleaning life easier.

A vacuum mop is a hard floor cleaner using a moisture mop pad while also hoovering up dust and debris. They are great for solid surfaces such as laminate, hardwood, or amtico. No loft living lifestyle is complete without a robot vacuum mop combo to do the chores.

settings.title: How do robot vacuum mops work?
settings.text: By using a mopping pad with a water tank it works within its operating boundary, the vacuum mop is able to treat and clean the hard floors it touches while at the same time utilizing its motor to suck up debris, dust, and anything else your floors accumulate. The beauty of our vacuum mop combos is they are robotic and therefore don't need much more than being taken care of, fully charged and not attacked by other robots.

settings.title: Customer reviews
settings.testimonial: It is awesome , took me two days to get it all under control：）We can finally keep our floors clean with 3kids .I give this product two thumbs up! I consider it the best purchase I’ve made in a long, long time. This combined with the floor cleaner with wave in its name have reduced the amount of time I spend cleaning the floors. I was dust mopping twice a day, but now there is no need.
settings.author: Eddie Johnson
